oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Loisirs, Nos. 13-14
Loisirs : revue art et littérature, mode et frivolités, sports et tourisme, reportages photographiques
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Alexandrie [Egypt] : [s. n.] ; Société de Publications Égyptiennes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Double issue of "Loisirs" magazine from January-February 1949. A focus of the issue was on the 16th Agriculture and Industry Exposition held in Zamalek.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alexandria (Egypt) -- Periodicals; Egypt -- Periodicals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
